author: cbs8
title: FCA US Statement Regarding New Tentative Agreement with the UAW
text:
FCA US LLC
AUBURN HILLS, Mich. , Oct. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- FCA US confirms that it has reached a new tentative agreement with the UAW. Because the agreement is subject to UAW member ratification, the Company cannot discuss the specifics of the agreement pending a vote by UAW members.
